InstructionData.Title: Volume Pump Controller
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Pump Controller​ # Mode: VPC-100​ # pump​ # value​ # LED display​ alias Pump d0​ alias Display d1​ alias setting r0​ alias active r1​ alias t0 r10​ ​ start:​ yield​ l setting db Setting​ sge active setting 0 # active if Pump Setting >= 0​ s Pump Setting setting​ s Pump On active​ s Display Setting setting​ j start
